) VALUES ( #{accPrimaryKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntPrimaryKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transAmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{settleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userInf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchntCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transSt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '99999999', '99999999', sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ACC_MCHNT_TRANS_LOG SET TRANS_ST = #{transSt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RESP_CODE = #{respCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE ACC_PRIMARY_KEY = #{accPrimaryKey}
